QueryResult.text: SELECT L.ID, L.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE, L.IS_ACTIVE, L.IS_DW_ENABLED, L.CREATED_DATE, L.CREATED_BY, L.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, L.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, L.WIKI_LANGUAGE_CODE, L.IS_SUPPORTED FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES L WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_LANGUAGES' AND NLS.PK_ID = L.ID
